guide.introduction: Do you prefer your laptop touch pad over a mouse, but wish it were just a little bit bigger? This guide shows how to build a keyboard tray to support a keyboard and large touchpad in a layout similar to that of a laptop. The design can be modified to accomodate other devices or layouts using the same technique.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Do you prefer your laptop touch pad over a mouse, but wish it were just a little bit bigger? This guide shows how to build a keyboard tray to support a keyboard and large touchpad in a layout similar to that of a laptop. The design can be modified to accomodate other devices or layouts using the same technique.

Tools
  • table saw, (if you have one) or you could use a bandsaw, or the old fashion hand saw, sand paper, file, measuring tape.
guide.summary: This guide shows how to build a custom wooden keyboard tray with a recessed touch pad below the keyboard.
